articles.author: Nic Savage
articles.title: Australian cricket legend dies aged 76
articles.description: Australian Test cricketer Alan “Froggy” Thomson has died aged 76.
articles.content: Australian Test cricketer Alan “Froggy” Thomson has died aged 76. The Victorian paceman, who played four Test matches during the 1970/71 Ashes series, passed away on Monday, his brother Ian confirme… [+2789 chars]

articles.title: 'Are you going to start eating the grass?'
articles.description: Kane Richardson defies nearly every old stereotype of the typical Australian fast bowler, with his vegan diet part of his wider awareness of the bigger picture outside of cricket.
articles.content: Kane Richardson has taken 81 wickets for Australia across all formats There's an old stereotype of the typical Australian fast bowler: big, scary, intimidating, and a win-at-all-costs mentality. B… [+4286 chars]

articles.title: Massive Fire Breaks Out At Restaurant In Pune
articles.description: The building also houses a restaurant owned by former Indian cricketer Zaheer Khan on the ground floor.
articles.content: Pune: A massive fire broke out at a restaurant in Maharashtra's Pune on Tuesday morning. The blaze erupted at the top floor of the Marvel Vista building located at the city's Lulla Nagar Chowk at aro… [+782 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
